```json
{
  "empty_string": "",
  "null_value": null,
  "nested": {
    "deep": {
      "deeper": {
        "deepest": "value"
      }
    }
  },
  "array_of_arrays": [
    [1, 2],
    [3, 4],
    [5, 6]
  ],
  "special_chars": "Line1\nLine2\tTabbed",
  "unicode": "日本語テスト",
  "numbers": {
    "int": 42,
    "float": 3.14159,
    "negative": -100,
    "scientific": 12300000000.0
  },
  "boolean": {
    "true": true,
    "false": false
  }
}
```
